WorkItem.Description:
Hi,
I have problem getting json data from this sample service. It appears that WebHttpRelayBinding doesn't relay json messages back to client. 
Â 
Steps to reproduce: run sample service. Issue GET request with Accept: application/atom+xml - data is returned. Issue GET request with Accept: application/json - connection closed and nothing is returned. 
Same request to local service using WebHttpBinding returns json fine. Any suggestion on how to modify WebHttpRelayBinding to support json content type?
